articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Cattle Farm of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Cattle Farm of KPA Unit
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the July 18 Cattle Farm under KPA Unit 580.
					The farm built on an area of more than 20,000 square meters thanks to the devoted efforts of KPA soldiers is a large stockbreeding center mass-producing beef.
					
					 After being briefed on the farm before a huge map showing its panoramic view, Kim Jong Il went round cattle sheds, fodder silos and other places of the farm to acquaint himself in detail with its technical equipment and cattle raising there. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the soldiers of the unit and employees of the farm have successfully built the cattle farm by their own efforts and rapidly increased the meat production by actively tapping latent  reserves, prompted by their patriotic desire to give even a little help to the country, and highly praised their feats.
					
					 Seeing herds of cattle move, he said that the head of cattle has increased dozens of times today, packing a valley with them, though there were only a small number of them even a few years ago. He repeatedly praised the employees of the farm for having brought about an amazing change through their indefatigable efforts.
					
					 The KPA soldiers intensely loyal to the Party, the revolution, the country and the people have built many great structures in the era of Songun including modern stockbreeding centers and fish breeding centers in different parts of the country, thus laying a firm foundation for building a thriving nation, confident of a rosy future even under the difficult conditions where everything was in short supply, he said, adding that these shining achievements are the laudable feats which can be performed only by the army of the DPRK, defender of the country and creator of the people's happiness.
					
					 He advanced important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the farm.
					
					 This farm has favorable conditions for rapidly boosting the livestock products as it is situated in a good place and has a vast area of pasture and is rich in water resource, he said, underscoring the need to further consolidate the existing production foundation and, at the same time, build more modern branch farms in various areas to develop the farm into a large stockbreeding center.
					
					 The experience of the recently built farms proves that in order to increase the efficiency of investment in stock-breeding it is most profitable to breed domestic animals growing fast and weighing heavy, he said, underscoring the need to pay deep attention to the research and development of breeding cattle suited to the topographical features and introducing them to production.
					
					 He noted that in order to keep the production of livestock products going at a high rate it is necessary to tenaciously push forward the work to build fodder bases including pasture, raise the fertility of fodder fields and drastically increase the yield and, at the same time, positively find out and use fodder sources to sufficiently provide a variety of fodder suited to the physiological features of domestic animals.
					
					 The most important guarantee for rapidly increasing the meat production is to put all the production processes of the farm on an industrial and scientific basis, he said, stressing the need to pay primary attention to it.
					
					 To this end, it is essential to intensify scientific researches and, at the same time, widely introduce advanced technology and steadily raise the level of the technical skill of officials, workers and technicians, he added.
					
					 Our country has conditions favorable for breeding grass-eating domestic animals in a big way in view of its geographic features, he noted, calling for minutely organizing the work to ensure that the existing stock-breeding centers pay off profusely and, at the same time, building more such centers and thus bring about a drastic turn in improving people's diet.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the employees of the farm would display all their creative ingenuity and enthusiasm and effect a fresh turn in the livestock production in the spirit of devoted service for the people.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army, Secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors of the WPK Central Committee Pak Nam Gi, Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: DPRK Slams UN "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
DPRK Slams UN "Human Rights Resolution"
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the "resolution on human rights situation" against the DPRK adopted at a meeting of the Third Committee of the 64th UN General Assembly:
					 The adoption of the said resolution is nothing but a trite political plot hatched by hostile forces against the DPRK every year.
					
					 It should never be overlooked that the U.S., playing a main role, instigated the EU, Japan and its other followers to fake up again a brigandish document defiling the system in the DPRK and infringing upon its sovereignty on the basis of all sorts of lies and fabrications.
					
					 The illegal and highhanded nature of the hostile action lies in that the "resolution" was railroaded through the meeting of the above-said committee despite the fact that a universal periodic review on the human rights situation in the DPRK is slated to be made at the UN Human Rights Council in coming December and majority member nations of the UN including the non-aligned countries are strongly opposed to the adoption of a country-specific resolution.
					
					  One should keep one's hands clean before pointing accusing fingers to others.
					
					 The U.S. is committing every day such human rights abuses as invading sovereign states under the pretext of "a war on terrorism" and brutally killing innocent civilians and other Western countries are plagued with all sorts of human rights abuses and social evils such as maltreatment of minorities and natives, racial discrimination, murder and prostitution. Are they entitled to dare take issue with other countries' human rights performance so shamelessly?
					
					Japan has not yet redeemed hideous human rights abuses it perpetrated in Korea last century such as the massacre of more than a million Koreans, the forcible drafting of at least 8.4 million Korean workers and the act of forcing 200,000 Korean women into sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. No matter how vociferous it wants to become it has no right whatsoever to say anything about human rights.
					
					 The DPRK categorically and totally rejects as it did in the past any "resolution" fabricated by the U.S. and its followers to do harm to the ideology and system in the DPRK chosen by its people as part of their interference in its internal affairs under the pretext of "championing human rights."
					
					 Human rights mean sovereign rights and the latter keeps every nation alive. 
					
					 One cannot think of enjoying genuine human rights and their protection without being provided with a guarantee for national sovereignty. This is the truth proven by the present reality of international relations.
					
					 The UN Charter recognizes the right to self-determination, the right of choice and the principle of non-interference in other's internal affairs.
					
					 No country in the world has the right to force its own socio-political system upon other country and it can never do so.

articles.title: Fossil of Tubular Animal Discovered
articles.content:
Fossil of Tubular Animal Discovered
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A fossil of tubular animal has been found out recently in Phyongsan area of North Hwanghae Province to attract attention of geologists of the DPRK.
					 The tubular animal was the first organism with skeletal structure on the earth. It was an elliptic tube-shape animal with nothing in abdomen.
					
					 Teachers and researchers of geology faculty of Kim Il Sung University excavated the fossil of the tubular animal in their in-depth research into the fossil of the Proterozoic era in some areas including Thangyo-ri, Phyongsan County, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 They found out fossils of primitive seaweeds and primitive jellyfish belonging to the period of transition from one-cell to multi-cell in Juche 90 (2001). Recently they discovered the fossil of the 5cm-long tubular animal again on the same stratum. 
					
					 According to varied analysis, the fossil is 620,000,000 years old.
					
					 The excavation of the fossil helps towards solving the crustal formation in a scientific way and concretizing the evolution process of organism.

articles.title: Achievements in Scientific and Technological Research
articles.content:
Achievements in Scientific and Technological Research
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Many achievements have been made in scientific researches which substantially help towards the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					 Technological innovations including a method of concretizing on ground and construction method by concrete prefab formwork have been introduced into the construction site of the Huichon Power Station, thus ensuring the safety of dam and gearing up the building tempo.
					
					 The Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex introduced new vortex burners into large-sized boilers to raise the combustion rate, markedly reducing the yearly consumption norms of coal and other fuels per boiler.
					
					 The complex also renovated the coal crusher so as to boost the serviceable life of the coal crusher axis ten times or more that of the former without the lubricating, closing and cooling systems.
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex developed and applied the electrode bonding control program to the UHP electric arc furnace, which makes it possible to improve the power-factor and shorten the melting time remarkably while saving electricity.
					
					 The Sinchang Youth Coal Mine under the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Complex adopted the technological innovations into production, including the establishment of a new prospecting method within pit by physical prospecting, technological renovation of the air blower and the introduction of the railroad without junction into transportation system.
					
					 Similar successes have been reported from the Rakwon Machine Complex. It invented and applied a new method of rotary continuous casting by metal mold instead of old sand mold and high-frequency heat treatment method. As a result it upped actual production rate of various steel castings and improved the quality of the large-sized parts.
					
					 The Ryongsong Machine Complex has manufactured new plane lapping machine and screw lathe to improve the cleanness of parts and to increase the productivity more than 20 times. It has also introduced an automatic heat-control device by computer into the heat-treating furnaces.
					
					 The Electricity Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences invented highly efficient wind power generators applicable to any regions and units.
					
					 The small, miniature and domestic use wind power generators are now working in revolutionary sites and revolutionary battle sites of Ryanggang Province and various cities and counties including Kaesong City, Hyangsan County and Onchon County.

articles.title: Efficacious Koryo Medicines
articles.content:
Efficacious Koryo Medicines
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Koryo medicine production units throughout the DPRK are producing efficacious Koryo medicines to promote the health of the working people.
					 The Phyongchon Koryo Medicine Factory is one of them.
					
					 The factory, which takes it as its technological development strategy to introduce latest science and technology and firmly guarantee the quality, is manufacturing lots of Koryo medicines. Among them are Roksahyang which improves brain and cardiac muscle ischemia, barrenwort tonic pill and a calcium acetate pill which is essential microelement complex. They are made with quality extract from various kinds of medicinal herbs.
					
					 Roksahyang is a functional Koryo medicine with medicinal ingredients improving the blood circulation and removing ischemia, aroma of green plants having pain-killing and sedating function and essential microelement complex.
					
					 It is potent for the treatment of brain and cardiac muscle ischemia for its medicinal function such as expanding coronary blood vessel, removing anoxia and repressing the formation of thrombus.
					
					 It is also applicable to cerebral thrombosis, aftermath of cerebral concussion, various diseases in circulatory system, nervous system and digestive system, carbon monoxide poisoning and others.
					
					 Aronia melanocarpa fruit injection restores the hypercholesterolemia content, neutral fat content and the index of the arteriosclerosis to normalcy.
					
					 Malt pancreatitis granule is specially efficacious for the treatment of chronic pancreatitis. 
					
					 The medicines produced at the factory are well received by public health organs throughout the country.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Extortion of Marine Resources
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Extortion of Marine Resources
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists occupied Korea illegally in the early 20th century and plundered its rich marine resources at random.
					 They fabricated and promulgated the laws and regulations for plundering marine resources and set up machinery for the purpose.
					
					 In order to ensure their pillage by law, the invaders promulgated the evil "Fishery Act", its enforcement regulations and the like in June 1911.
					
					 According to the act, the Japanese imperialists preferentially gave the fishery right to the Japanese fishermen and fishery monopolies under their protection and forcibly robbed the Korean fishermen of their fishing ground.
					
					The number of "obtaining the chartered fishery right" by the Japanese in Korea reached more than 2,680 cases during the 10 years from 1911 to 1920.
					
					 Therefore, the right to monopoly of marine resources and the fishery right in Korea were seized by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Following the fabrication of all evil laws and machinery, they left no stone unturned to extort the precious marine resources of Korea.
					
					 They sent many Japanese fishermen and fishing boats to Korea and made the fishing boats motorized and large-sized.
					
					The number of the Japanese fishing boats which caught fish in the Korean seas grew from over 5,650 in 1912 to over 10,620 in 1916.
					
					 The pillage of the marine resources by the Japanese imperialists was intensified entering the 1930s.
					
					 At that time, they forced the Korean fishermen to increase fish production under the pretext of "fishing village promotion campaign".
					
					 In an attempt to realize their predatory ambition, the Japanese imperialists compelled Korean fishermen to deep-sea fishing with small wooden boats only to kill lots of them.
					
					 For the purpose of meeting the demand for ever growing military supplies, the Japanese imperialists were also hell bent on taking away sardine which amounted to 50 percent of the total fish catch in Korea at that time.
					
					 The Korean fishermen had to live a miserable life owing to the Japanese imperialists' brutal plunder of abundant marine resources.
					
					 The Japanese authorities must completely liquidate the crime-woven past.

articles.title: Anniversary of Pomminryon Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Pomminryon Observed
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates a signed article to the 19th anniversary of the formation of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon). 
					 Pomminryon formed on November 20, Juche 79 (1990) is a pan-national organization for the reunification patriotic movement which regards it as its mission to achieve Korea's reunification on the three principles-- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity-- and unites close the pro-reunification movement organizations of Koreans of all circles and broad strata of compatriots at home and abroad and encourages them to accomplish the cause of independent reunification. 
					
					 Pomminryon has made great successes in the efforts to achieve national reconciliation and unity and strengthen and develop the movement for national reunification over the past 19 years since its formation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Pomminryon has developed to be a pro-reunification movement organization with well-regulated organizational system as it has regional headquarters and branches, etc. in the north and the south and overseas where Koreans live, a mass organization which groups Koreans from all walks of life. It has successfully performed its mission and role, while energetically rousing all the Koreans to a struggle for great national unity and the country's reunification under the uplifted banner of the three charters for national reunification and the five-point policy for great national unity.
					
					  The advent of the June 15 era of reunification, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself", marked an important occasion of putting the activities of Pomminryon on a higher level.
					
					 Pomminryon has energetically explained the validity and vitality of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and  the necessity to implement them and powerfully encouraged all Koreans at home and abroad in their efforts to put them into practice. It has laid bare and denounced every move of the anti-reunification forces to obstruct the implementation of the inter-Korean declarations, while negating them, in particular, and injected fresh energy into the movement for Korea's reunification.
					
					 Reunification festivals of various forms took place in the north and the south and overseas on the occasions of the anniversaries of the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and the August 15 liberation day, the solidarity among the north and south sides and overseas side grew strong and the movement for national reunification has developed to be a nation-wide movement grouping workers, peasants, youth and students, women and people of all other strata. This would be unthinkable without the role of Pomminryon as an umbrella body for great national unity.
					
					 Sure to triumph is the patriotic cause of Pomminryon making a dynamic advance along the road of great unity and national reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration amid the expectation of the Koreans at home and abroad and their positive support and encouragement.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo, Handicraft Exhibition Held in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo, Handicraft Exhibition Held in Russia
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition was held in Russia from Oct. 30 to Nov. 13 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 83rd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Displayed in the venue of the function were books and photos introducing Songun Korea and Korean handicrafts.
					
					 Speeches were made at its opening ceremony.
					
					 A. Damzinov, deputy prime minister of the Republic of Bryatia who doubles as its minister of Social Development, said that the exhibition would provide people of Bryatia with an opportunity to witness at first hand the spirit of the resourceful and intelligent Korean people and renew the impression of the DPRK, adding that he would make positive efforts to ensure that such exhibition would be held in the future, too.
					
					 The representative of the Russian Foreign Ministry in Ulan-Ude noted that the Russia-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation have reached a high level under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries, expressing his belief that it would grow stronger in the future.
					
					 N. Boronoyeva, curator of the Art Gallery Named after Sampilov, said going round the DPRK exhibition, the first of its kind since its founding, she felt the impulse to know more about the DPRK and see it for herself. 
					
					 The exhibition drew a large crowd of people of Bryatia while it was under way.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige granja de res de la Unidad No. 580 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige granja de res de la Unidad No. 580 del EPC
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja Ganadera de Res 18 de Julio adscrita a la Unidad No.580 del EPC.
					Esta granja, construida en una vasta area de mas de 20 mil metros cuadrados gracias a la lucha abnegada de los militares del ejercito popular, es una de las bases pecuarias de gran tamano capaz de producir en grandes cantidades la carne de res.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano, el Dirigente recorrio los corrales, el saladero de forrajes y otros lugares informandose en detalles del estado de los equipos tecnicos y la cria.
					
					Aprecio mucho los meritos de los uniformados de la unidad y los empleados de la granja mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan construido por cuenta propia esta magnifica granja buscando y usando activamente las reservas internas con la unica voluntad patriotica de beneficiar al pais aunque fuera modestamente y registraran un salto en la produccion de la carne.
					
					Al contemplar las vacas en bandadas, volvio a reconocer los esfuerzos de los empleados de la granja, que trajeron este cambio sorprendente con sus incansables trabajos, destacando que aqui habia pocas cabezas hasta hace unos anos y ahora ellas se han multiplicado en decenas de veces hasta colmar este valle de vacas.
					
					Subrayo que los militares del EPC, infinitamente fieles al partido y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo, sentaron la solida base de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera al edificar por doquier, bajo la situacion tan dificil en que escasea lo todo, modernas bases ganaderas y de piscicultura y otras grandes creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) confiando en el futuro maravilloso.
					
					 Anadio que este exito orgulloso es la brillante hazana que puede ser lograda solo por nuestro ejercito, defensor de la patria y creador de la felicidad del pueblo. El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion y la operacion de la granja.
					
					  Dijo que esta granja tiene condiciones favorables para el incremento brusco de la produccion pecuaria como buena ubicacion, amplia extension de herbazales y abundante fuente de agua. 
					
					  Resalto la necesidad de desarrollarla como base ganadera de gran tamano al acondicionar modernas granjas anexas en varias zonas consolidando la existente base productiva.
					
					  Indico que las experiencias de las granjas ganaderas construidas recientemente comprueban que la cria de los ganados, que crecen rapidamente y pesan mucho, es lo mas rentable para elevar la eficiencia de inversiones en la ganaderia.
					
					Continuo que es imprescindible prestar profunda atencion a las faenas encaminadas a investigar, desarrollar y aplicar en la produccion las razas bovinas convenientes a las peculiaridades zonales. 
					
					Para normalizar en el alto nivel la produccion pecuaria, hay que crear con tenacidad los herbazales y otras bases de pasto y aumentar la fertilidad de las mismas, de modo que se incremente decisivamente su rendimiento, enseno.
					
					  Igualmente, se debe buscar y usar activamente otras fuentes de pienso a fin de alimentar en lo suficiente a los ganados con diversos cebos convenientes a sus caracteristicas fisiologicas, recalco.
					
					  Indico que es preciso prestar primordial atencion a la industrializacion y la fundamentacion cientifica de todos los procesos productivos de la granja, dado que en estas labores esta la garantia mas importante del aumento brusco de la produccion de carne.
					
					  Para este fin, -destaco- hace falta intensificar la investigacion cientifica, introducir activamente las tecnologias avanzadas y elevar constantemente el nivel tecnico y la calificacion de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos.
					
					  En vista de sus caracteristicas geograficas, nuestro pais tiene condiciones favorables a la cria en masas de los ganados herbivoros, dijo y senalo la importancia de producir un viraje trascendental en la mejora de la vida alimentaria de nuestro pueblo al pormenorizar las labores organizativas para que aporten beneficios las bases ganaderas ya preparadas y al construir las nuevas.
					
					  Al final, expreso su gran esperanza y seguridad de que los empleados de la granja produciran un nuevo viraje en la produccion pecuaria al trabajar con su inteligencia creativa y pasion partiendo de su espiritu de servir abnegadamente al pueblo.
					
					  Entre los acompanantes del Dirigente se distinguian los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Saqueo de recursos maritimos de Corea por imperialismo japones
articles.content:
Saqueo de recursos maritimos de Corea por imperialismo japones
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Los imperialistas japoneses, que a principios del siglo XX ocuparon ilegalmente Corea, saqueo indiscriminadamente los abundantes recursos maritimos.
					Inventaron las legislaciones y organizaron los sistemas de aparato para el particular.
					
					En junio de 1911, emitieron la maligna "ley de pesca" y las reglas de su aplicacion para garantizar legalmente el pillaje.
					
					Segun la nueva ley, ellos dieron primordialmente a los pescadores japoneses y los monopolios de la rama bajo su amparo el derecho a la pesca y arrebataron de modo forzoso las zonas de pesca a los pescadores coreanos.
					
					El numero de "adquisicion del derecho a la pesca" de los japoneses en Corea durante los 10 anos, desde 1911 hasta 1920, llega a mas de 2 mil 680.
					
					Con ello, los imperialistas japoneses se apoderaron de la exclusividad de los recursos acuaticos y el derecho a la pesca de Corea.
					
					Tras inventar diversas leyes malsanas y los sistemas de aparato para el saqueo de los recursos maritimos, los despojaron valiendose de los medios y metodos.
					
					   Introdujeron en Corea un gran numero de pescadores y barcos pesqueros y motorizaron e hicieron grandes estos barcos.
					
					Se incremento de mas de 5 mil 650 a mas de 10 mil 620 el numero de los barcos que se dedicaban exclusivamente a la pesca en los mares coreanos entre 1912 y 1916.
					
					 En la decada de 1930, tal saqueo se torno mas perverso.
					
					Ellos impusieron a los pescadores coreanos aumentar la produccion de pescado so pretexto de la "campana de fomento de aldea de pescadores".
					
					Para realizar su ambicion saqueadora, obligaron a los pescadores coreanos que tenian solo botes, a salir a alta mar para pescar, debido a lo cual murieron numerosos pescadores coreanos.
					
					Tambien, para cubrir la demanda creciente de los materiales belicos, recurrieron freneticamente al saqueo de sardina que habia ocupado en Corea la mitad del valor total de productos maritimos de aquel tiempo.
					
					Debido al atroz saqueo del imperialismo japones, el pueblo coreano se vio obligado a la vida miserable sin disfrutar ni un minimo del beneficio de abundantes recursos maritimos en sus mares.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben liquidar todos sus crimenes del pasado.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora dia de constitucion de la APRP
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora dia de constitucion de la APRP
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 19o aniversario de la constitucion de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) (20 de noviembre del 79 (1990) de la Era Juche), el diario Rodong Sinmun inserto hoy un articulo individual.
					La APRP es una organizacion pannacional del movimiento patriotico por la reunificacion que toma por su mision realizar la reunificacion de la patria a base de los 3 principios de la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional y estimula a las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion de distintos sectores y amplios connacionales en el interior y el exterior del pais a la realizacion de la causa de la reunificacion independiente agrupandolos como un haz, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Durante los 19 anos pasados que datan de su fundacion, la APRP logro grandes exitos en el camino para realizar la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y fortalecer el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Fue fortalecida como una entidad del movimiento por la reunificacion que dispone del ordenado sistema de organizacion como la direccion regional y la sucursal en todos los lugares del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar donde viven los coreanos y una organizacion masiva que incorpora ampliamente a los connacionales de distintos sectores y capas. Vino cumpliendo excelentemente su mision y papel movilizando energicamente a todos los coreanos a la lucha por la gran unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria con la bandera de las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria y 5 Orientaciones para la Gran Unidad Nacional en alto.
					
					La preparacion de la epoca de la reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio, cuyo ideal principal es "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", sirvio del importante motivo para fortalecer aun mas las actividades de la APRP. Esta propago activamente la justicia y la vitalidad de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y la necesidad de su ejecucion y llamo energicamente a todos los coreanos en el interior y el exterior del pais a su materializacion.
					
					En particular, revelo y condeno a cada paso las maquinaciones de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion que niegan las declaraciones Norte-Sur e impiden su ejecucion, y activo mas el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria. Con motivo del 15 de junio y el 15 de agosto (dia de liberacion de la patria) se efectuaron en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar diversas actividades de festival por la reunificacion y se fortalecio la solidaridad tripartita del Norte, el Sur y ultramar. El movimiento por la reintegracion de la patria se ha ampliado como el movimiento pannacional que incorpora a distintos sectores y capas inclusive los obreros, campesinos, jovenes, estudiantes, mujeres, etc. 
					
					Todo esto no se puede imaginar al margen del papel de la APRP, entidad principal de la gran unidad nacional.
					
					Saldra victoriosa sin falta la causa patriotica de la APRP que avanza a pasos firmes por el camino de la gran unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria enarbolando la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre bajo la esperanza y el activo apoyo de todos los coreanos en el pais y en ultramar.
